topic.fullpath: Topic :: Multimedia :: Graphics :: Capture :: Screen Capture

name: snapwaves
short_description:
Snapwaves is a simple KDE program for recording screen. It is capable of recording the whole desktop, a single window, a section of a window or a selected region.
This will also support voice-recoding from microphones.
